project.name: SparkIT — ICT Literacy Initiative
project.tagline: Igniting ICT literacy across Sri Lanka, one district at a time.
project.about: SparkIT explores Sri Lanka's digital economy through hands-on learning and maker energy. Start in Phase 1 to register and pitch your idea; build in Phase 2; showcase in Phase 3.

phases.title: Phase 1 & 2 — Bridging the Gap
phases.summary: For schools already exposed to ICT, SparkIT strengthens their foundation with advanced programming, robotics, and cybersecurity.

phases.title: Phase 2 — Advanced Foundation
phases.summary: Students dive into advanced topics like programming, robotics, and cybersecurity to match real industry needs.

phases.title: Phase 3 — The Big Leap
phases.summary: Monthly district workshops with sci-fi themed immersive learning, establishing ICT societies and continuous mentorship.
